oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Exterior of graphite reactor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A large dark building with two levels of windows and four vents on the roof. A single pipe leads to a group of smaller buildings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clinton Laboratory; Nuclear reactors; Oak Ridge National Laboratory; Pipes (Conduits)
